page-tournament-details.shoes-information-nubbed: are characterized by a sole featuring numerous small, flat studs evenly distributed across the surface. They have a rather subtle profile, giving a structured appearance due to the many small protrusions, without the studs extending significantly from the sole.
page-tournament-details.shoes-information-cleaded: have a sole with round or conical cleats, which are larger and fewer in number compared to the nubs. They are evenly distributed and protrude more than the nubs, yet they appear more compact than the longer studs found in studded shoes.
page-tournament-details.shoes-information-studded: , on the other hand, feature longer, more prominent studs that can be either fixed or replaceable. These studs often come in different shapes—such as conical or sharp-edged—and are clearly separated from each other, creating a distinctive look.

page-manage-team.name: Name
page-manage-team.information-usage: What do we use the information on this page for?

login.locked-permanently: The password was wrong too many times, check your emails to reset your password.
login.locked-temporarily: The password was wrong too many times, try again in

register.username-info: Your username must be a unique sequence of numbers and letters so that everyone can identify you clearly.
register.username-min: Username must be at least 2 characters
register.password-min: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.name: Name
register.name-info: Your display name. It's best to enter the name here by which most people in the community know you.
register.city-info: Here you can specify the city you come from or where you train.
register.birthdate-info: Your date of birth is only stored so that you can later filter tournaments more quickly on the tournament page that are approved for your age group.

create-tournament.name: Name
create-tournament.tournament-dates-info: The Date in this field only refers to the date where the tournament takes place. For arrival, pompf-check, etc. please use the arrival dates.
create-tournament.arrival-dates-info: Only enter when they differ from the tournament dates. E.g. on a one day tournament without accommodation just leave the fields blank
create-tournament.deadlines-placeholder: e.g. payment deadline, 1st waiting round, 2nd waiting round
create-tournament.shoes-information-nubbed: are characterized by a sole featuring numerous small, flat studs evenly distributed across the surface. They have a rather subtle profile, giving a structured appearance due to the many small protrusions, without the studs extending significantly from the sole.
create-tournament.shoes-information-cleaded: have a sole with round or conical cleats, which are larger and fewer in number compared to the nubs. They are evenly distributed and protrude more than the nubs, yet they appear more compact than the longer studs found in studded shoes.
create-tournament.shoes-information-studded: , on the other hand, feature longer, more prominent studs that can be either fixed or replaceable. These studs often come in different shapes—such as conical or sharp-edged—and are clearly separated from each other, creating a distinctive look.
